archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0968
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As Head of Tax I want to know that the new Comarch system will correctly calculate GST on supplies made by Vodafone NZ to non-resident telecommunications suppliers.

properties.value: Examples of non-resident telecommunications suppliers to be provided? Does it include Netflix for example? To be discussed what kind of suppliers must be supported in BSS, we didn't see BUC related to this yet. Info from IPB stream: not expected for horizon 1. Please confirm.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
